<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105575</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105575</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205264</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Rise of Community Activism</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Anstieg von Gemeinschaftsaktivismus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'élévation d'activisme de la Communauté</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A ascensão do activism da comunidade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'aumento di activism della Comunità</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η άνοδος του κοινοτικού ακτιβισμού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La subida de activismo de la comunidad</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will related lessons learned about community organizing and activism to issues today, identifying leadership roles and legal channels to have an impact on their own communities. Analysis of the birth of the Western Addition Community Organization in San Francisco will frame the context.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer willen die in Verbindung stehenden 
Lektionen, die über Gemeinschaftszu den Ausgaben heute organisieren 
und Aktivismus erlernt werden und kennzeichnen Führungrollen und 
zugelassene Führungen, um eine Auswirkung auf ihre eigenen 
Gemeinschaften zu haben. Analyse der Geburt der westlichen 
Hinzufügung Gemeinschaftsorganisation in San Francisco gestaltet den 
Kontext.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants veulent des leçons relatives 
renseignées sur l'organisation et l'activisme de la communauté aux 
issues aujourd'hui, identifiant des rôles de conduite et des canaux 
légaux pour avoir un impact sur leurs propres communautés. 
L'analyse de la naissance de l'organisation occidentale de la 
Communauté d'ajout dans San Francisco encadrera le contexte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes querem as lições relacionadas 
aprendidas sobre organizar e activism da comunidade às edições 
hoje, identificando papéis da liderança e as canaletas legais para 
ter um impacto em suas próprias comunidades. A análise do 
nascimento da organização ocidental da comunidade da adição em San
Francisco moldará o contexto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi vogliono le lezioni relative imparate 
circa l'organizzazione ed il activism della Comunità alle edizioni 
oggi, identificando i ruoli di direzione e le scanalature legali per 
avere un effetto sulle loro proprie Comunità. L'analisi della 
nascita dell'organizzazione occidentale della Comunità dell'aggiunta 
a San Francisco incornicerà il contesto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές τα σχετικά παθήματα που γίνονται 
μαθήματα για την κοινοτικούς οργάνωση και τον ακτιβισμό στα 
ζητήματα σήμερα, που προσδιορίζουν τους ρόλους ηγεσίας και τα 
νομικά κανάλια για να ασκήσουν επίδραση στις κοινότητές τους. 
Η ανάλυση της γέννησης της δυτικής κοινοτικής οργάνωσης 
προσθηκών στο Σαν Φρανσίσκο θα πλαισιώσει το πλαίσιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes quieren las lecciones relacionadas
aprendidas sobre la ordenación y el activismo de la comunidad a las 
ediciones hoy, identificando papeles de la dirección y los canales 
legales para tener un impacto en sus propias comunidades. El 
análisis del nacimiento de la organización occidental de la 
comunidad de la adición en San Francisco enmarcará el contexto.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
